transport.question: I have wheels and carry people around town. I stop at designated places. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I usually stop frequently.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Many people can ride me at the same time.
🗺️ I follow a specific route.

transport.question: I have two wheels, and you use pedals to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: ⛰️ I'm good for riding on paths and streets.
💪 You need to use your legs to move.
🔔 Some people have a bell on me to warn others.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky, carrying people to faraway lands. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am much bigger than a bird.
✈️ I need a runway to take off and land.
🌎 I can take you to a different country.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and can carry many passengers. I often go underground. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a set path.
🚇 Sometimes, I disappear underground.
⏰ I am often used to get to work or school quickly.

transport.question: I float on water and carry people or goods across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am much bigger than a toy boat.
⚓ I need a port or harbor to dock.
🧭 I can sail across oceans.

transport.question: I have a motor and two wheels, and I'm faster than a bicycle. What am I?

hints.text: ⛑️ You usually wear a helmet when riding me.
⛽ I need fuel to run.
💨 I make a loud noise.

transport.question: I’m like a bus, but I have flexible sections. What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 I follow bus routes through the city.
↔️ I can bend and turn more easily than a regular bus.
🔗 I look like several buses connected together.

transport.question: I have large rotor blades on top that allow me to take off and land vertically. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one spot.
🚨 I am often used for rescue missions.
🏥 Some are air ambulances

transport.question: I use wind power to move across the water, but I'm not a regular sailboat. I am used for a sport.

hints.text: 💨 I need a lot of wind to work well.
🏄 I have a board that you stand on.
🌊 I am also known as windsurfing

transport.question: I travel to outer space and carry astronauts. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am much faster than an airplane.
👩‍🚀 I take people to the moon and beyond.
🌌 I need a special launchpad.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I'm known for my excellent memory.
🥜 I use my nose to pick up food.
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase mice. I like to purr when you pet me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐈 I have soft fur and sharp claws.
🥛 I often drink milk.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🐾 I'm known as man's best friend.
🏡 I protect your house.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. I have webbed feet. What am I?

hints.text: 🐥 My babies are called ducklings.
🌾 I eat weeds and plants.
💦 I love to play in water.

animal.question: I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. I have a big mane. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am at the top of the food chain.
🦁 I live in Africa.
🥩 I eat meat.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. I love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I have strong hind legs.
🐰 I can be found in gardens.
🐾 I leave cute little tracks.

animal.question: I slither and have no legs. Some of us are venomous. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I shed my skin.
🔥 I can be found in many different habitats.
🐭 Some eat rodents.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. I am a horse, but different. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I'm native to Africa.
🌱 I graze on grass.
💃 My stripes help me camouflage.

animal.question: I have a pouch for my babies. I hop around Australia. What am I?

hints.text: 🦘 I have strong legs for jumping.
🇦🇺 I'm a marsupial.
🌳 I eat plants and shrubs.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. I can change color to hide. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I squirt ink when scared.
🌊 I am very intelligent and can solve problems.
🐠 I eat crabs and small fish.
